original_text: They continued on their journey. A man came and spoke to Jesus. He said, ‘I will go with you. And I will go with you everywhere that you go.’
korean_text: 길 가실 때에 어떤 사람이 여짜오되 어디로 가시든지 나는 따르리이다

sentences.original_text: A man came and spoke to Jesus.
He said, 'I will go with you.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 말했습니다, '나는 당신과 함께 갈 것입니다.'

sentences.original_text: And I will go with you everywhere that you go.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신이 가는 모든 곳에서 나는 당신과 함께 갈 것입니다.'
